members.name: Tal Kachman
members.bio: Assistant Professor at Radboud University AI Department and Visiting Assistant Professor at Yale School of Management. Research focus on multiagent interaction, complex systems, and reinforcement learning.

members.name: Benny Kempinski
members.bio: PhD student working on game theoretical LLM reasoning and deep learning driven value attribution calculation.

members.name: Celena Jordaan
members.bio: PhD student focusing on deep learning for prosthetics design.

members.name: Chiara Thoni
members.bio: PhD student working on dynamical neural network driven chemical discovery.

members.name: Andrei Voinea
members.bio: PhD student developing LLM driven scientific tooling for autonomous chemical laboratories.

members.name: Fynn Gerding
members.bio: Master's student working on reinforcement learning in structure emergence environments.

members.name: Veronica Bolzonella
members.bio: Master's student researching neural auto regressive models for LLM sampling.

members.name: Stian Gronlund
members.bio: Master's student investigating dynamical information theory for neural networks training.

members.name: Marcellina Niechcial
members.bio: Bachelor's student studying the mathematical structure of bifurcations in training dynamics.

members.name: Samuel Nellessen
members.bio: Bachelor's student working on LLM driven adversarial attacks for red teaming.
